title: Perl Code Assistant
author: Talib Ul Haq,  Ratna Kumari Chitturi, Goura Mohanty
description: This asset translates Perl syntax and constructs into Java. It helps developers by providing explanations for complex Perl code. The asset works on two levels: 1. **Subroutine Level**: Converts and explains individual Perl subroutines. 2. **Whole Script Level**: Translates the entire Perl script to Java with detailed explanations.
